name: Robo-mountain
description:
A perspective changing game about 2 robots who need to cooperate to reach the summit of a mountain.

2 cute little robots and 1 blocky mountain. Help the other robot by pressing buttons to open doors. Play with a friend on 1 keyboard, or play online. Climb up and reach the top to achieve the robot's life long goal.

The game is very hard for unexperienced gamers, but if you've played at least 2 games in your life you should have a lot of fun.

If you're stuck, jump off the map and you'll respawn at the last flag you reached.

A game by Badduck

2D art made by Eli

Music made by Chirs Murphy and Fupi

Made as an entry to Miziziziz's chain letter jam. I was nominated by Zyger. Please check them out because without them the game wouldn't exist.

Enjoy!
